title: Dear world, we are your ally in the East￼.

replies.msg:
Dear world, we are your ally in the East￼.
Engulfed ￼￼by the communist, we are at the front line defending our values.
They took our freedom, sieged our universities and controlled our courts.
Countless have been locked up.
Thousands have been tortured, raped and killed.
A whole generation of people are at stake
The Brits promised to stand with us when they sold us out
Now their eyes could only see money
Yet our bravest souls are fighting with their last breath, confronting the red armies with tears and blood
Dear world, where are you?
We are in despair
We are the people of Hong Kong.

想作首詩去向西方表達絕望，有冇巴打可以幫下改下

quote.msg:
Dear world, we are your ally in the East￼.
Engulfed ￼￼by the communist, we are at the front line defending our values.
They took our freedom, sieged our universities and controlled our courts.
Countless have been locked up.
Thousands have been tortured, raped and killed.
A whole generation of people are at stake
The Brits promised to stand with us when they sold us out
Now their eyes could only see money
Yet our bravest souls are fighting with their last breath, confronting the red armies with tears and blood
Dear world, where are you?
We are in despair
We are the people of Hong Kong.

replies.msg:
World 包括埋 北韓同中國
仲有海量唔尊重民主自由既撚樣
有d骨氣 唔需要搏佢地同情
美國pass 法案都唔係出於同情
而係對佢地貿易戰有利
令到香港人對佢地既價值更加可貴
eg 輸出更多有能之士去美國 香港人開既公司要佔一席位
當年猶太人都係咁玩
當注重商業既民族 比人genocide之下 既反擊玩法
